WAFRRedoCmd.Title: Redo
WAFRRedoCmd.LongHelp: Redo keeps a track of your last actions.You can recover the actions you performed one action at a time. When there is no action to recover, Redo is replaced by Repeat which lets you restart a command that you just used.
WAFRUndoCmd.Title: Undo
WAFRUndoCmd.LongHelp: Undo keeps a track of your last actions. You can reverse the actions you performed, one action at a time.
WAFRURFlushCmd.Title: Flush Undo/Redo stacks
WAFRURFlushCmd.LongHelp: Removes from the history all finished global actions performed in the current context.
WAFUROverview.Title: Undo/Redo Overview
WAFUROverview.ShortHelp: Lists the actions that can be reversed or recovered.
WAFUROverview.LongHelp: Select the actions to be reversed from the top. Select the actions to be recovered from the bottom.
